personalInfo.description: Skilled Full stack JavaScript developer with 2 years of experience in various industries, including telecommunication, e-commerce and B2B. Demonstrated capability in managing projects from conception to completion, working closely with stakeholders to design and implement solutions. Proficient in JavaScript, React.js, Redux, Next.js, Node.js and UI libraries. Dedicated to crafting user-friendly, scalable and secure systems.

workExperience.description: Led development of multiple web applications using React, Node.js, and cloud technologies. Mentored junior developers and implemented best practices for code quality and performance.
Developed responsive web applications and user interfaces. Collaborated with design teams to implement pixel-perfect designs and optimize user experience.
Built and maintained web applications from scratch. Gained experience in full-stack development and agile methodologies.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with honors. Focused on software engineering, algorithms, and web development. Completed capstone project on machine learning applications.
Intensive bootcamp covering modern web development technologies including React, Node.js, databases, and deployment strategies.

projects.name: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, payment processing, inventory management, and admin dashboard.

projects.name: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, and project tracking capabilities.

projects.name: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive weather application that provides current weather conditions, forecasts, and location-based weather data with interactive maps.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing my work and skills. Built with React and styled with modern CSS techniques.
